name: AllowNoInternetSetup
description: Allows you to setup Windows 11 without an internet connection

name: AllowPowerShellScriptExecution
description: Allows PowerShell script execution on the machine (sets the execution policy to RemoteSigned)

name: CleanStartMenu
description: Removes everything from the Start Menu

name: DisableAdvertisingInfo
description: Disables advertising info

name: DisableAutomaticReboot
description: Disables automatic reboots after updates

name: DisableCopilot
description: Disables system integration of Copilot

name: DisableDesktopWidgets
description: Disables desktop widgets in the taskbar

name: DisableFastStartup
description: Disables fast startup

name: DisableInternetResults
description: Disables internet results in the Start Menu which makes it a lot faster and more private

name: DisableLastAccess
description: Disables last access timestamp updates (for NTFS) which can improve performance

name: DisableMouseAcceleration
description: Disables mouse acceleration

name: DisableOnlineTips
description: Disable online tips

name: DisableStoreRecommendations
description: Disables Windows Store recommendations

name: DisableWindowsDefender
description: Disables Windows Defender

name: BypassWin11Requirements
description: Bypasses Windows 11 requirements (TPM, Secure Boot, CPU, Ram, Storage & Disk)

name: EnableClipboardHistory
description: Enables clipboard history

name: EnableLongPaths
description: Enable long paths (up to 32,767 characters)

name: RemoveBloatware
description: Removes bloatware that comes with Windows 11

name: RemoveBluetoothIcon
description: Removes the Bluetooth icon from the system tray (still accessible from tile menu)

name: RemoveMRT
description: Removes the Malicious Software Removal Tool

name: RemoveOneDrive
description: Prevents OneDrive from being installed

name: TakeOwnership
description: Add a context menu item to take ownership of files and folders

name: UltimatePerformance
description: Adds and enables the Ultimate Performance power plan

name: UninstallEdge
description: Uninstall Microsoft Edge (browser only). Warning: you will not have an internet browser after this
